description.translate: Contemplative, as for the unattainable tomorrows; but impatient as well as desperate for the end.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Veille finale\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Contemplatif, quant aux lendemains inaccessibles;\"}","{\"text\":\"§7mais impatient tout autant que désespéré par la fin.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Contemplative, as for the unattainable tomorrows;\"}","{\"text\":\"§7but impatient as well as desperate for the end.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7HAS§a4 §7RES§a1\"}"]}}
